name: Par-coop
description:
Made in a school project under the module: Game Programming 2 (SP DGDD)

Survival in a race against the timer along side your teammate to try and escape the dungeon.

Use your agility and skill to navigate through the traps and be careful not to be caught by the big bad golem!

Designed and Coded by:

https://itch.io/profile/dlogerid and me

Assets:

Provided by teacher
